languages.text: "Я предпочту быть сдержанн{mf|ым|ой} и милостив{mf|ым|ой} в действиях. Излишние недоверчивость и мнимость озлобляют сердца людей".

traits.locale_text: "Я предпочту быть сдержанн{mf|ым|ой} и милостив{mf|ым|ой} в действиях. Излишние недоверчивость и мнимость озлобляют сердца людей".

languages.text: "I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."
languages.original_text: "Я предпочту быть сдержанн{mf|ым|ой} и милостив{mf|ым|ой} в действиях. Излишние недоверчивость и мнимость озлобляют сердца людей".

traits.locale_text: "I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of people and send them against each other."
"I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of people and send them against each other."
"I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."
"I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."
"I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."

languages.text: “我会尽可能地保持仁慈与宽容。过度的猜忌与怀疑会让人民的心肠变硬，让他们彼此仇视。”
languages.original_text: "I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."

traits.locale_text: “我会尽可能地保持仁慈与宽容。过度的猜忌与怀疑会让人民的心肠变硬，让他们彼此仇视。”

languages.text: «Ejerceré contención e indulgencia en mis acciones. Un exceso de sospecha y desconfianza endurece los corazones de la gente y hace que se vuelvan los unos contra los otros».
languages.original_text: "I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."

traits.locale_text: «Ejerceré contención e indulgencia en mis acciones. Un exceso de sospecha y desconfianza endurece los corazones de la gente y hace que se vuelvan los unos contra los otros».

languages.text: 「私は己の行動に自制と寛容を働かせている。過ぎたる疑念と不信は人々の心を硬化させ、互いに敵対させるものだ」
languages.original_text: "I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."

traits.locale_text: 「私は己の行動に自制と寛容を働かせている。過ぎたる疑念と不信は人々の心を硬化させ、互いに敵対させるものだ」

languages.text: "Ich lasse mein Handeln von Zurückhaltung und Nachsicht leiten. Übertriebenes Misstrauen verhärtet das Herz der Menschen und bringt sie gegeneinander auf."
languages.original_text: "I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."

traits.locale_text: "Ich lasse mein Handeln von Zurückhaltung und Nachsicht leiten. Übertriebenes Misstrauen verhärtet das Herz der Menschen und bringt sie gegeneinander auf."

languages.text: « Je fais preuve de retenue et d'indulgence dans tout ce que j'entreprends. La méfiance et le doute endurcissent les cœurs et mènent les gens à se déchirer. »
languages.original_text: "I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."

traits.locale_text: « Je fais preuve de retenue et d'indulgence dans tout ce que j'entreprends. La méfiance et le doute endurcissent les cœurs et mènent les gens à se déchirer. »

languages.text: "Eylemlerimde daha kısıtlı ve hoşgörülü davranmaya çalışacağım. Aşırı şüphe ve güvensizlik, insanların kalplerini katılaştırır ve birbirlerine cephe almalarına neden olur."
languages.original_text: "I will exercise restraint and lenience in my actions. Excessive suspicion and mistrust harden the hearts of the people and turn them against each other."

traits.locale_text: "Eylemlerimde daha kısıtlı ve hoşgörülü davranmaya çalışacağım. Aşırı şüphe ve güvensizlik, insanların kalplerini katılaştırır ve birbirlerine cephe almalarına neden olur."
